ygData.subject: posting of scenarios online
ygData.msgSnippet: tevildo, when you get a chance, try to upload your scenarios into this area as I have done mine.  That way, it will be easier for players to find scenarios.

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

tevildo, when you get a chance, try to upload your scenarios into this 
area as I have done mine.  That way, it will be easier for players to 
find scenarios.

Folks at FSGames - I hope I did not make any of you mad by uploading 
my scenarios here.

Oh yea, I will NOT be working on scenarios for a while (several 
readers applaud considering the difficulty of DPH's scenarios) until I 
buy a new PC, which should not be long.
